2024 Full Year Immunology Segment Net Sales: USD 53.7 billion (+12% reported, +12% CC)
2023 Full Year Immunology Segment Net Sales: USD 45.4 billion (+8% reported, +10% CC)
The reported immunology segment net sales in full year 2024 were 12% higher than in full year 2023, and the results are the same on both a reported and constant currency basis compared to 2023.
Cosentyx's net sales in the immunology segment for the full year 2024 were USD 53.7 billion, showing a 12% increase compared to the full year 2023 (USD 45.4 billion, a 10% increase), both on a reported and constant currency basis.
